meanings.definition: A tooth with two points or cusps, especially a human premolar tooth.
meanings.sent1: My bicuspids help me chew my food.
meanings.sent2: The dentist filled the cavity in one of my bicuspids.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bit my tongue while trying to eat with my bicuspids.
meanings.sent4: Her smile revealed a row of shiny bicuspids.
meanings.sent5: The child lost his first bicuspids and eagerly awaited the tooth fairy's visit.

meanings.definition: A bicuspid valve in the heart.
meanings.sent1: The doctor listened to the sound of the bicuspids in the patient's heart.
meanings.sent2: The bicuspid valve prevents blood from flowing backward in the heart.
meanings.sent3: The heart surgeon carefully repaired the patient's faulty bicuspids.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic opening and closing of the bicuspids kept the blood flowing smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The healthy functioning of the bicuspids ensured proper circulation throughout the body.
